title: Pooparikka Solli Lyrics Malai Malai
stanzas:
Pooparikka solli
poovaa kaettukollum
naan parithu kondaal
koodaathendra sollum(2)

mai vizhi sillendra maargazhi
un mozhi sangeetha semmozhi
kai vazhi varaadho paingilkili
konjalaam nenjodu konjam vaadi

anbaana snegithaa
chinnatha settai seiyendaa
achchaaram enbathai
ippodhu poattu vaiyendaa

anbaana snegithi sollai
naan thaanda maattene
aanaalum sullena
unarchiyai thoonda mattene

punnaigai poovai veesi
enai boomiyil saaithaaye
manmadi serum munne
enai unmadi serthaaye

en vizhi thookkam paarthu
ingu aezhettu naalaachu
kannimai naangum verthu
nirkka kaaranam neeyaachu.

yaar yaarku yaaro
yaar solluvaaro
semmannum neerum
sernthaal pin vaero.

kanavil ninaikkavillai
kaalgal nadakkumullai
enakku kidaikkum ena naan.

anbaana snegithaa
chinnatha settai seiyendaa
achchaaram enbathai
ippodhu poattu vaiyendaa

anbaana snegithi sollai
naan thaanda maattene
aanaalum sullena
unarchiyai thoonda mattene

kaaranam indri dhegam
mazhi kaalathil verkiradhe
maiyalai enna solla
athu veiyilai vaarkirathe

veppathil vaadum podu
indha theppathil neeyeedhu
eppavum kadhal vandhaal
ingu aayiram kolaaru

nee indru vazhnthaal
neer thaedum verthaan
naam ondru sernthaal
vazhthaatho oorthaan.

enakku enakku endru
irukkum azhagu moththam
unaku unaku inimael.

anbaana snegithaa
chinnatha settai seiyendaa
achchaaram enbathai
ippodhu poattu vaiyendaa

anbaana snegithi sollai
naan thaanda maattene
aanaalum sullena
unarchiyai thoonda mattene

Pooparikka solli
poovaa kaettukollum
naan parithu kondaal
koodaathendra sollum

Pooparikka solli
poovaa kaettukollum
nee parithu kondaal
vendaamendraa sollum
